text: Greg Wells is a musician and twice Grammy-nominated record producer. He is from Peterborough, Ontario, Canada, and lives and works in Los Angeles. ==References== ==Other websites== * Greg Wells Website * Greg Wells Myspace * Wells interviewed in NY Times article * Recent interview in webzine "www.laptoprockers.eu" Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian songwriters Category:Musicians from Peterborough, Ontario
title: Greg Wells
